item.title: Car park, 24th October
item.description:
Hello there car park surface need to be fix this is the third time my tires on my car has popped there is lot of pothole and dont think is fair for us who lives here to pay for permits and are cars are getting destroyed could you please look into this

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Riverbank Road, Downham, London

item.title: Hedge obstructing pavement, 24th October
item.description:
The hedge outside no. 92 is hugely overgrown and blocking the pavement meaning buggies and wheelchair users canâ€™t get through or struggle to get through. Especially worse on bin days, forcing pedestrians in to the road.

item.title: Constant intravenous drug use, 24th October
item.description:
Prestwood street used for drug purchases and drug taking. Individuals openly inject drugs and sleep here. Needles, foil, spoons and blood soiled tissues and bedding

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Prestwood Street, Hackney, London

item.title: Abandoned vehcile, 24th October
item.description:
Vehicle abandoned for >1 month. Normally very few different cars are parked along the road, and belong to residents, but this car had not been seen previously. The car has two completely flat tires, and nobody has been near the car.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Church Lane, Bromley Common, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Query if vehicle outside no. 31 has been dumped?, 24th October
item.description:
The van has not moved in several weeks, and I am becoming concerned that it may have been dumped. An internet search revealed that though it is taxed, it does not have a valid MOT (checked here: https://car-check.co.uk/check/BG19FYH). I did not check whether it was missing or stolen, since that would have meant paying a fee.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Richmount Gardens, Kidbrooke, London
Report on FixMyStreet
